description.narrative: The Millennium Challenge Corporation's (MCC) $7.4 million threshold program with the Government of Sao Tome and Principe is focused on improving their performance on the policy areas measured by MCC's Fiscal Policy and Business Start-up eligibility indicators. Specifically, program will help the Government of Sao Tome and Principe to improve its performance on the Fiscal Policy indicator by increasing revenue as a result of improved tax and customs administration and enforcement. It also seeks to improve performance on the Days to Start a Business and Cost of Starting a Business indicators by streamlining business registration procedures.

participating-org.narrative: Millennium Challenge Corporation

title.narrative: Sao Tome and Principe Threshold Program Agreement
Sao Tome and Principe Threshold Program Summary

description.narrative: Sao Tome and Principe - BUSINESS ENVIRONMENT project: Draft legislation and identify administrative procedures necessary to streamline business registration, to include the establishment of a "one-stop shop" for business registration and other regulatory reforms. Develop recommendations for implementation of new business registration procedures. Draft work procedures and recommendations for organizational restructuring required to implement new business registration legislation.

description.narrative: Sao Tome and Principe - BUSINESS ENVIRONMENT - Business Environment activity: Drafted decree on commercial and notary codes; Advised on reforms to the business registration process; Provided computers and office furniture to the Guichet Unico, the business registration entity in the country.

usg:implementing-agent.usg:description: Millennium Challenge Account - Sao Tome and Principe

usg:usg-activity.usg:purpose-statement: Sao Tome and Principe - BUSINESS ENVIRONMENT - Business Environment activity: Drafted decree on commercial and notary codes; Advised on reforms to the business registration process; Provided computers and office furniture to the Guichet Unico, the business registration entity in the country.

description.narrative: Sao Tome and Principe - CUSTOMS REVENUE project: Modernize the Customs Service by: conducting an assessment of all facilities, upgrading Customs Service software by installing ASYCUDA World, analyzing and supporting implementation of new legislation and regulations, conducting training activities, establishing a customs cooperation council along with the local trade community to encourage compliance, providing support for entry into the World Customs Organization, and providing basic inspection, communications and transport equipment. Enhance customs operations and procedures; and enhance professionalism in the Customs Service by: implementing procedures to limit discretionary actions, developing and implementing a Customs Code of Ethics and Conduct, establishing, and providing training for, an Ethics Council in the Ministry of Planning and Finance.

usg:implementing-agent.usg:description: Millennium Challenge Account - Sao Tome and Principe

usg:usg-activity.usg:purpose-statement: Sao Tome and Principe - Program Administration and Control - MCA Morocco & Implementing Entities activity: this activity was used in the past for accounting purposes but it is not currently an active activity for the program. It has no funds either committed or disbursed against it and has a sector code of 99810 (sector not specified).

description.narrative: Sao Tome and Principe - VOLUNTARY COMPLIANCE WITH TAX LAWS project: Provide technical assistance to develop and implement new tax legislation and regulations. Improve the integrity of the taxpayer registration system. Strengthen the taxpayer accounting system.

participating-org.narrative: Millennium Challenge Corporation
Millennium Challenge Corporation
Millennium Challenge Account (MCA) - Sao Tome and Principe
Millennium Challenge Account (MCA) - Sao Tome and Principe
Millennium Challenge Account (MCA) - Sao Tome and Principe

condition.narrative: Further details on conditions precedent affecting this activity can be found in the top-level parent activities.

description.narrative: Sao Tome and Principe - VOLUNTARY COMPLIANCE WITH TAX LAWS - Voluntary Compliance with Tax Laws activity: Increased filing of required declarations through dissemination of tax information, simplification of procedures, creating forms and regulations to implement tax laws, improving employee knowledge, improving public knowledge of obligations under the new tax laws, and providing capacity for future in-house training; Assisted with registration of taxpayers through provision of hardware and software tools; Increased revenue through effective and fair implementation of tax procedure codes, providing a review of tax code and suggestions for improvement and regulations; Assured a sound taxpayer accounting process through analyzing the revenue accounting system and making recommendations for improvements to administrative and informational infrastructure, ensured internal management controls are adequate, determined systemic needs and jointly implement improvements to the current system.

usg:implementing-agent.usg:description: Millennium Challenge Account - Sao Tome and Principe

usg:usg-activity.usg:purpose-statement: Sao Tome and Principe - VOLUNTARY COMPLIANCE WITH TAX LAWS - Voluntary Compliance with Tax Laws activity: Increased filing of required declarations through dissemination of tax information, simplification of procedures, creating forms and regulations to implement tax laws, improving employee knowledge, improving public knowledge of obligations under the new tax laws, and providing capacity for future in-house training; Assisted with registration of taxpayers through provision of hardware and software tools; Increased revenue through effective and fair implementation of tax procedure codes, providing a review of tax code and suggestions for improvement and regulations; Assured a sound taxpayer accounting process through analyzing the revenue accounting system and making recommendations for improvements to administrative and informational infrastructure, ensured internal management controls are adequate, determined systemic needs and jointly implement improvements to the current system.

description.narrative: Sao Tome and Principe - TAX ENFORCEMENT project: Establish information technology infrastructure to connect ministries in order to identify unregistered taxpayers and non-filers. Improve collection procedures and management. Provide technical assistance to improve auditing procedures. Improve the ability of tax officials to conduct on-site canvasses, audits and collections activities.

participating-org.narrative: Millennium Challenge Corporation
Millennium Challenge Corporation
Millennium Challenge Account (MCA) - Sao Tome and Principe
Millennium Challenge Account (MCA) - Sao Tome and Principe
Millennium Challenge Account (MCA) - Sao Tome and Principe

condition.narrative: Further details on conditions precedent affecting this activity can be found in the top-level parent activities.

description.narrative: Sao Tome and Principe - TAX ENFORCEMENT - Tax Enforcement activity: Increased numbers of enforced registrations, audits and collection of arrears by strengthening informational infrastructure; Collected additional accumulated tax arrears through improved process management and technical skill; Increased detection of non-filers to achieve an increase in registrations, declarations filed and taxes paid; Increased revenues through improvements to the audit process; Increased revenue through more on-site access to taxpayer records.

usg:implementing-agent.usg:description: Millennium Challenge Account - Sao Tome and Principe

usg:usg-activity.usg:purpose-statement: Sao Tome and Principe - TAX ENFORCEMENT - Tax Enforcement activity: Increased numbers of enforced registrations, audits and collection of arrears by strengthening informational infrastructure; Collected additional accumulated tax arrears through improved process management and technical skill; Increased detection of non-filers to achieve an increase in registrations, declarations filed and taxes paid; Increased revenues through improvements to the audit process; Increased revenue through more on-site access to taxpayer records.

description.narrative: Sao Tome and Principe - TAX ENFORCEMENT - Customs Revenue activity: this activity was used in the past for accounting purposes but it is not currently an active activity for the program. It has no funds either committed or disbursed against it and has a sector code of 99810 (sector not specified).
